Working on the Intel RealSense R100 (passive multi-view stereo system) technology featured in Dell Venue tablets (from prototype to released product).  
 
1. Image Synthesis: Developed color and depth image in-painting, depth edge detection, depth foreground and background segmentation, depth image warping and mesh generation algorithms.  
 
2. Depth edge refinement: Developed algorithms to align edges of depth buffer to those of objects in color image. 
 
3. Stereo vision algorithm: Smoothing of cost volume in the disparity computation algorithm.  
 
4. Disparity ground-truth dataset: Register the images captured from a multi-camera stereo system with points cloud scanned by LIDAR to generate a disparity ground-truth dataset.
